cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Def_Column__c.name: cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Def_Column__c
cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Def_Column__c.description: This object defines the query attributes of the Segmentation Rule Definition.

cgcloud__Field_Alias__c.description: Alias that's specified in the SOQL building.

cgcloud__Field_Default__c.description: Default value that's shown when the input mask is rendered for this field.

cgcloud__Field_List_Template__c.description: If the field type is List, then this field defines the content of the list.

cgcloud__Field_Number_Digits__c.description: For Number fields, it defines the number of digits after the decimal point.

cgcloud__Field_Picklist_Target__c.description: If the field type is either Picklist or List with the template as Picklist, then this field defines the picklist to choose. The format is <sObject>.<Attribute>. This field is ignored for any other field type.

cgcloud__Field_Regex__c.description: Applies to user input. If the input is a list, the regex applies to each list entry separately.

cgcloud__Field_Title__c.description: Defines the label of the field that used to define segmentation parameters.

cgcloud__Field_Type__c.description: Defines the type of field that's used to define segmentation parameters.

cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Def__c.description: Reference to the segmentation rule definition.
